title: User Registration with Valid Email and Password
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with a valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Input valid email and strong password
Submit registration form
Verify registration is successful and user receives confirmation

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check that user can login successfully using a valid email and password combination.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input correct email and password
Click on login button
Verify user is logged in and redirected to main dashboard

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with invalid email or password and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid email or incorrect password
Attempt to login
Verify login is blocked and error message is displayed

title: Profile Customization - Update Avatar and Display Name
description: Check that users can update their profile avatar and display name successfully.

steps.description: Login and navigate to profile settings
Change avatar image from available selections
Edit display name field
Save changes
Verify profile updates are reflected in user interface

title: Interactive Tutorial Completion
description: Validate the tutorial guides new users through game basics and completes without errors.

steps.description: Login as new user and start interactive tutorial
Follow all tutorial steps including game play instructions
Verify tutorial completes with success message and user can proceed to bingo rooms

title: Host Creates Bingo Room with Custom Settings
description: Verify that a host can create a bingo room with specified rules, prizes, and configuration settings.

steps.description: Login as Host and open HostDashboard
Navigate to create new bingo room
Configure room settings including prize, max players, and game rules
Submit the form to create the room
Verify new bingo room is listed and accessible with correct settings

title: Host Approves and Denies Players in Lobby
description: Check that host can view pending player requests and approve or deny entry into the room.

steps.description: Host navigates to LobbyScreen for a bingo room
View list of players requesting to join
Approve some players and deny others
Verify approved players enter ParticipantLobby, denied players receive notification

title: Synchronized Bingo Number Drawing
description: Verify that the bingo numbers are drawn centrally and synchronized in real-time to all connected players with voice narration.

steps.description: Host starts number drawing in an active bingo room
Confirm all players receive the same drawn number simultaneously
Verify voice narration announces each drawn number accurately and promptly

title: Player Marks Bingo Card and Claims BINGO
description: Confirm player can mark numbers on their card and successfully claim BINGO, triggering victory animations and rewards.

steps.description: Player marks numbers as they are drawn
Player claims BINGO when conditions are met
Validate victory animations and sound effects display
Verify player receives correct BPoints/BCoins reward

title: Victory Celebration Animations and Sound Effects
description: Check that celebratory animations and sounds simultaneously play for winners across all clients.

steps.description: Simulate a player winning a bingo round
Verify all connected clients display victory animations and hear sound effects in sync

title: Real-time Room Chat with Emojis
description: Verify users can send and receive messages instantly in room chats including use of emojis.

steps.description: Join a bingo room and open room chat
Send a text message including emojis
Verify all participants see the message immediately with emojis rendered correctly

title: Global Chat Messaging and Emoji Support
description: Ensure users can communicate in the global chat and that emojis in messages display properly.

steps.description: Access global chat channel
Send a message containing emojis
Verify message delivery to all users and correct emoji display

title: Friend System - Send and Accept Friend Invites
description: Test that users can send friend requests, receive them, and accept or decline via the message center.

steps.description: User A sends a friend invite to User B
User B checks message center for invite
User B accepts the friend request
Verify both users appear in each other's friend lists

title: Global Ranking Leaderboard Accuracy
description: Validate that the global leaderboard displays the correct player rankings based on BPoints.

steps.description: Open global ranking leaderboard
Check leaderboard player stats and rankings match backend data

title: Store Purchase with BPoints and BCoins
description: Verify users can purchase cosmetic items and boosters using BPoints and BCoins with correct balance deduction and item application.

steps.description: Navigate to virtual store
Select item requiring BPoints and confirm purchase
Verify BPoints are deducted accordingly and item is added to user's inventory
Select item requiring BCoins and confirm purchase
Verify BCoins are deducted correctly and item applies visually if cosmetic

title: Automatic Logout Triggered After 10 Minutes Inactivity
description: Ensure the app automatically logs out users after 10 minutes of inactivity to secure user sessions.

steps.description: Login to the application
Remain inactive for over 10 minutes
Verify user is logged out automatically and redirected to login page

title: Persistent Game State Across Page Refresh and Network Fluctuations
description: Validate that the bingo game state remains consistent and persists when the user refreshes the page or temporarily loses network connectivity.

steps.description: Join active bingo round and participate
Refresh the browser page during active gameplay
Verify bingo game state is restored to the current round without resets
Simulate temporary network loss and recovery during gameplay
Verify game state remains synchronized and no data loss occurs

title: Application Initial Load Performance
description: Test that the app loads initial content and interface within 3 seconds on supported desktop and mobile devices.

steps.description: Launch the app on supported device
Verify user interface is interactive and fully loaded within 3 seconds

title: Accessibility - Voice Narration Functionality for Number Draws
description: Ensure voice narration announces the bingo numbers clearly and reliably for accessibility.

steps.description: Start bingo number drawing in a game
Verify voice narration announces each drawn number correctly and without delay

title: Error Handling - Room Creation with Invalid Settings
description: Verify that creating a bingo room with invalid or missing required fields triggers validation errors preventing submission.

steps.description: Login as host and navigate to create room
Attempt to submit room creation form with empty mandatory fields or invalid values
Verify clear validation error messages are displayed for each invalid entry

title: Error Handling - Purchase Attempt with Insufficient Funds
description: Confirm that attempting to purchase store items without sufficient BPoints or BCoins prevents purchase and shows relevant error message.

steps.description: Login as user with insufficient BPoints or BCoins
Attempt to purchase an expensive store item
Verify purchase is blocked and insufficient funds error message is shown
